description: This file defines the interface for the DobbyContainer management within a plugin architecture, including method declarations for container lifecycle operations, container information retrieval, and event handling, as well as private members related to proxy objects, event IDs, and IPC services.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: A class providing an API to manage Dobby containers, handling their lifecycle, state, and related events.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the Dobby interface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Terminates the Dobby interface, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Gets detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with given parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container using a specific Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a container, optionally forcing termination.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with specified options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation key from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a source to a target inside a container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a target from a container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Event callback for container start events.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Event callback for container stop events.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Event callback for changes in container state.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Event callback for verification failures.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
